text: :The native form of this personal name is Csonka András. This article uses the Western name order. András Csonka (born 1988) is a Hungarian para table tennis player. He started playing table tennis aged nine when his brother played the sport as a hobby. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1988 births Category:Sportspeople from Budapest Category:Hungarian male table tennis players Category:Paralympic table tennis players of Hungary Category:Medalists at the 2016 Summer Paralympics Category:Table tennis players at the 2016 Summer Paralympics Category:Paralympic medalists in table tennis Category:Paralympic silver medalists for Hungary
title: András Csonka (table tennis)
